DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine, whether the urinary diversion via suprapubic cystostomy compared to transurethral catheterization after robot-assisted radical prostatectomy superior the postoperative patient comfort and reduce the postoperative bacteriuria.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Randomized Trial Comparing Urinary Diversion After Robot-assisted Radical Prostatectomy
DOC.criteria: 1. Minimum age of 18 Years 2. Voluntarily agreement to participate in this study 3. Written informedconsent 4. Release of medical records for regulatory or research purposes 5. Clinically organconfined prostate cancer 1. BMI >40 2. History of catheterization 3. History of radiation 4. History of chemotherapy 5. Person's participating in any other research 6. Unable to provide informed consent
